task_list.name: Het aanroepen en overschrijven van variabele

task.py.name: task.py
task.py.text:
x = "Hello"
y = 43
z = False


## Opdracht 1: Print variabele x, overschrijf deze met een nieuwe string en print variabele x opnieuw.
print(x)
x = "World"
print(x)

## Opdracht 2: Print variabele y, verhoog deze met 1 en print variabele y opnieuw.
print(y)
y = y + 1
print(y)

## Opdracht 3: Print variabele z, overschrijf deze met True en print variabele z opnieuw.
print(z)
z = True
print(z)

## Opdracht 4: Overschrijf alle variabele (x, y en z) met 0.
x = 0
y = 0
z = 0

print(x)
print(y)
print(z)

tests.py.text:
from test_helper import run_common_tests, failed, passed, get_answer_placeholders


def test_answer_placeholders():
    placeholders = get_answer_placeholders()
    placeholder = placeholders[0]
    if placeholder == "":       # TODO: your condition here
        passed()
    else:
        failed()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    run_common_tests()
    # test_answer_placeholders()       # TODO: uncomment test call

task.py.text:
varA = 6
varB = 1
varC = 6
varD = 8

## Opdracht 1: Vul de verschillende velden in met de juiste data.
sumA = varB + varD
#Variabele naam: sumA
#Variabele waarde: 9
#Variabele type: integer

sumB = varA + varC
#Variabele naam: sumB
#Variabele waarde: 12
#Variabele type: integer

subA = sumA - varA
#Variabele naam: subA
#Variabele waarde: 3
#Variabele type: integer

subB = sumB - varB
#Variabele naam: subB
#Variabele waarde: 11
#Variabele type: integer

multA = varA * varB
#Variabele naam: multA
#Variabele waarde: 6
#Variabele type: integer

multB = varC * varD
#Variabele naam: multB
#Variabele waarde: 48
#Variabele type: integer

powA = varA ** varB
#Variabele naam: powA
#Variabele waarde: 6
#Variabele type: integer

powB = varC ** varD
#Variabele naam: powB
#Variabele waarde: 1679616‬
#Variabele type: integer

task.py.text:
varA = 4
varB = 9
varC = 4.2
varD = -53.2

#Task 1
equA = varA == varB
#Variabele naam: equA
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

equB = varC == varD
#Variabele naam: equB
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

equC = varB == varB
#Variabele naam: equC
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

#Task 2
uneqA = varA != varB
#Variabele naam: uneqA
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

uneqB = varC != varD
#Variabele naam: uneqB
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

uneqC = varB != varB
#Variabele naam: uneqC
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

largerA = varA > varC
#Variabele naam: largerA
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

largerB = varB > varD
#Variabele naam: largerB
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

largerC = varA > varA
#Variabele naam: largerC
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

largerequA = varA >= varC
#Variabele naam: largerequA
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

largerequB = varB >= varD
#Variabele naam: largerequB
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

largerequC = varA >= varA
#Variabele naam: largerequC
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

smallerA = varA < varC
#Variabele naam: smallerA
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean
smallerB = varB < varD
#Variabele naam: smallerC
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

smallerC = varA < varA
#Variabele naam: smallerC
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

smallerequA = varA <= varC
#Variabele naam: smallerequA
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

smallerequB = varB <= varD
#Variabele naam: smallerequB
#Variabele waarde: False
#Variabele type: boolean

smallerequC = varA <= varA
#Variabele naam: smallerequC
#Variabele waarde: True
#Variabele type: boolean

task.py.text:
x = 4
y = 6

expressionA = 8 * 5 + 5 / 2
#Stap 1:    40 + 5 / 2
#Stap 2:    40 + 2.5
#Stap 3:    42.5
#Type  :    Float

expressionB = x * 5 + y / 2
#Stap 1:    4 * 5 + y / 2
#Stap 2:    20 + y / 2
#Stap 3:    20 + 6 / 2
#Stap 4:    20 + 3
#Stap 5:    23
#Type  :    Integer

expressionC = expressionB >= expressionA
#Stap 1:    23 >= expressionA
#Stap 2:    23 >= 42.5
#Stap 3:    False
#Type  :    Boolean

expressionD = expressionC or expressionA > 40
#Stap 1:    False or expressionA > 40
#Stap 2:    False or 42.5 > 40
#Stap 3:    False or True
#Stap 4:    True
#Type  :    Boolean

    returnValue = ceasarCypher(toBeCyphered, amountOfStepsToChange)
    print("Your ceasar cyphered message is:\n"+returnValue)

## Input1: String, input2: Integer
## Return: String

#Keyword: if
#Uitgevoerd: Ja

y = 2
#Keyword: if
#Uitgevoerd: Ja

Week 3 - Branching/If/Programma 3/task.py
additional_files.text:
x = 5
y = 21
#Keyword: if
#Uitgevoerd: Ja
#Conditie variabele(n): x
#Conditie: x > 0
#Conditie uitkomst: True
if(x > 0):
    print("Stap 1.")
    #Keyword: if
    #Uitgevoerd: Ja
    #Conditie variabele(n): x, y
    #Conditie: x * 2 <= 14
    #Conditie uitkomst: False
    if(y / x <= 4):
        print("Stap 2.")
print("Stap 3.")
print("Einde programma.")

additional_files.text:
x = 21/3
y = x * 2
#Keyword(s): if, else
#Uitgevoerd: Ja
#Conditie variabele(n): x
#Conditie: x < 15
#Conditie uitkomst: True
#Uitgevoerd pad: 1
if(x < 15):
    print("Pad 1.")
    #Keyword(s): if
    #Uitgevoerd: Ja
    #Conditie variabele(n): y
    #Conditie: 10 >= y
    #Conditie uitkomst: False
    #Uitgevoerd pad: 3
    if(10 >= y):
        print("Pad 2.")
    else:
        print("Pad 3.")
else:
    print("Pad 4.")

additional_files.name: Week 3 - Branching/Geneste if - else/Programma 2/tests/test_task.py
Week 3 - Branching/Geneste if - else/Programma 2/task.py
additional_files.text:
x = 21/3
y = x/3 * 4
z = 24
#Keyword(s): if, else
#Uitgevoerd: Ja
#Conditie variabele(n): z
#Conditie: x < 15
#Conditie uitkomst: True
#Uitgevoerd pad: 1
if(z > 20):
    print("Pad 1.")
    #Keyword(s): if, else
    #Uitgevoerd: Ja
    #Conditie variabele(n): y
    #Conditie: 10 >= y
    #Conditie uitkomst: False
    #Uitgevoerd pad: 2
    if(5 <= y):
        print("Pad 2.")
        #Keyword(s): if, else
        #Uitgevoerd: JA
        #Conditie variabele(n): x, y
        #Conditie: 10 >= y
        #Conditie uitkomst: False
        #Uitgevoerd pad: 4
        if(50 >= x * y):
            print("Pad 3.")
        else:
            print("Pad 4.")
    else:
        print("Pad 5.")
else:
    print("Pad 6.")
print("Einde programma.")

additional_files.name: Week 3 - Branching/Geneste if - else/Programma 3/tests/test_task.py
Week 3 - Branching/Geneste if - else/Programma 3/task.py
additional_files.text:
x = 21/3
y = x/3 * 4
z = 24
#Keyword(s): if, else
#Uitgevoerd: Ja
#Conditie variabele(n): z
#Conditie: x < 15
#Conditie uitkomst: False
#Uitgevoerd pad: 6
if(z < 20):
    print("Pad 1.")
    #Keyword(s): if, else
    #Uitgevoerd: Nee
    #Conditie variabele(n): y
    #Conditie: 10 >= y
    #Conditie uitkomst: False
    #Uitgevoerd pad: geen
    if(5 <= y):
        print("Pad 2.")
        #Keyword(s): if, else
        #Uitgevoerd: Nee
        #Conditie variabele(n): x, y
        #Conditie: 10 >= y
        #Conditie uitkomst: False
        #Uitgevoerd pad: geen
        if(50 >= x * y):
            print("Pad 3.")
        else:
            print("Pad 4.")
    else:
        print("Pad 5.")
else:
    print("Pad 6.")
print("Einde programma.")

#Task 1
array1 = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

for element in array1:
    print(element)

#Task 2
string1 = "abcd"

returnString = ""
for symbol in string1:
    if(len(returnString)<3):
        returnString = returnString + symbol

#Task 3
array2 = [True, False, True, True, True, False, False, True]
counter = 0
for boolean in array2:
    if(not(boolean)):
        counter = counter + 1
print(str(counter) + " Falses counted")

additional_files.text:
players = []

players.append(["p1", 27])
players.append(["p2", 43])
players.append(["p3", 72])
players.append(["p4", 12])
players.append(["p5", 22])
players.append(["p6", 61])

loser =players[0]

for i in (range(len(players))):
    points = players[i][1]
    if(loser[1] > points):
        loser = players[i]

winner = players[0]

for player in players:
    points = player[1]
    if(winner[1] < points):
        winner = player

print(winner[0] + " is the winner with " + str(winner[1]) + " points!")
print(loser[0] + " is the loser with " + str(loser[1]) + " points...")

conditionVar1 = 0

while(conditionVar1 < 5):
    conditionVar1 = conditionVar1 + 0.5

#Amount of iterations:  5
conditionVar2 = 10

while(conditionVar2 >= 0):
    conditionVar2 = conditionVar2 - 2

#Task 3
#Amount of iterations:  50
conditionVar3 = 100

while(conditionVar3 != 50):
    if(conditionVar3>50):
        conditionVar3 = conditionVar3 - 1
    else:
        conditionVar3 = conditionVar3 + 1

    print(array1[index])
    index = index + 1

    print(array1[index])
    index = index - 1

    index = 0
    while(index < len(array2)):
        array2[index] = array1[index] + array2[index]
        index = index + 1

additional_files.text:
products = [["Apple", 2], ["Bread", 1], ["Melon", 3]]
amounts = [0, 0, 0]

amounts[0] = int(input("How much "+products[0][0]+ " would you like?\n"))
amounts[1] = int(input("How much "+products[1][0]+ " would you like?\n"))
amounts[2] = int(input("How much "+products[0][0]+ " would you like?\n"))

total = products[0][1] * amounts[0] + products[1][1] * amounts[1] + products[2][1] * amounts[2]

print("You have to pay: "+ str(total))

additional_files.text:
persons = [["p1", 19], ["p2", 18], ["p3", 22], ["p4", 21]]

person1Age = persons[0][1]
person3Name = persons[2][0]

print("person 1: " + persons[0][0] +" with age: " + str(person1Age))
print("person 2: " + persons[1][0] +" with age: " + str(persons[1][1]))
print("person 3: " + person3Name +" with age: " + str(persons[2][1]))
print("person 4: " + persons[3][0] +" with age: " + str(persons[3][1]))

print("The combined age of all persons is: " + str(persons[0][1] + persons[1][1] + persons[2][1] + persons[3][1]))
